topic.title: Chapter 1
topic.shortdesc: Cinderella losses her loving mother and gains a step-mother, who brings two of her own cruel daughters.

section.title: A Tragic Beginning
section.p: A woman with a young daughter fell sick and when the woman knew she was near the end of her life, she called for her daughter one last time. The mother told her daughter Dear child, be pious and good, and God will always take care of you, and I will look down upon you from heaven, and will be with you. The mother passed away, and her poor daughter wept over her mothers grave every day, and was always pious and good.

section.title: Cruel New Family
section.p: Winter cam and snow covered the grave, and when the snow melted in spring, the widower had taken another wife. The daughter now had a step-mother and two step-sisters that were quite beautiful but were black and ugly at heart. had not been taught to be kind.

section.title: Life With The Step-Sisters
section.p: The step-sisters were very cruel to their still grieving sister together with their mother forced the daughter to work from the start of the day until the end drawing water, making the fires, cooking, and washing. With no bed to lie on, she slept by the fireside among the ashesThe step-sisters came up with a mean nick name and so they called her Cinderella.
